metadata.description: Every skilled tradesperson has an apprenticeship story. Whether an apprentice, employer or teacher, everyone has an inspirational story to share about their apprenticeship journey.

Skip to main content 

![](/sites/default/files/2024-03/Miho%20Cropped.jpg)

Sep 17, 2025

Miho Hind: Preparing For Technical Training 

In 2024, we shared the inspirational story of Miho Hind – a newcomer and new mom who found a supportive community in her new career as a plumbing apprentice. We connected with her on the eve of her starting level 3 technical training to see how she is doing.

[ Learn more](/miho-hind-preparing-technical-training)

Results 28 - 36 of 48

![Mega Power Installations ](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2023-11/MegaPower.JPG.webp?itok=L6Ut9hvT)

Nov 09, 2023

#####  [Recognizing Mega Power Installations ](/recognizing-mega-power-installations)

For Apprenticeship Recognition Month, the Greater Victoria School District is recognizing Mega Power Installations for their longstanding partnership and contributions to supporting youth in trades and apprenticeships. 

![Two chefs show off their salmon dish](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2023-07/danika-patricia-level2-web.jpg.webp?itok=Tu-NkW7y)

Jul 25, 2023

#####  [Success Story: Danika Haynes](/success-story-danika-haynes)

Danika Haynes is a young professional cook apprentice with a bright future ahead of her.

![Rebecca Marshall](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2023-06/Rebecca-Marshall-02.jpg.webp?itok=xc2ei24o)

Jun 20, 2023

#####  [Celebrating Indigenous Peoples in the Skilled Trades: Rebecca Marshall](/celebrating-indigenous-peoples-skilled-trades-rebecca-marshall)

This month, we are celebrating Indigenous Peoples in the skilled trades! Rebecca Marshall is a Red Seal Cook, who works as a Transport Canada Endorsed Ship's Cook aboard an Emergency Tow Vessel on the coast of British Columbia. Read this Q&A to learn more about her apprenticeship journey and what being Indigenous means to her. 

![Red Seal Machinist](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2023-06/Chelsea%20Barron%202.jpg.webp?itok=H88r_EoB)

Jun 12, 2023

#####  [Celebrating Indigenous Peoples in the Skilled Trades: Chelsea Barron](/celebrating-indigenous-peoples-skilled-trades-chelsea-barron)

For Chelsea Barron, growing up in a family of tradespeople made the decision of pursuing a career in the skilled trades a natural choice. Read on to learn about her Red Seal journey as well as her reflections on what Indigenous History Month and Indigenous People's Day means to her. 

![marine apprentices](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2023-02/blackline-marine-apprentices_1.png.webp?itok=riN_BK36)

Nov 17, 2022

#####  [Recognizing the Apprentices of Blackline Marine](/recognizing-apprentices-blackline-marine)

For Apprenticeship Recognition Month, Blackline Marine is recognizing their Marine Service Technician apprentices Christopher, Jeff, Hiep, and Martin!

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2022-11/Judy%20Chin.jpg.webp?itok=lqjgwhhW)

May 10, 2022

#####  [Asian Heritage Month Feature: 金巧淳 (Judy Chin)](/judy-chin)

As part of Asian Heritage Month, we’re highlighting and celebrating the diverse backgrounds of the tradespeople that make up British Columbia’s labour force. In this Q&A, we connected with 金巧淳 (Judy Chin), a Red Seal Welder working as a Welder Fabricator in Coquitlam, BC.

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2022-11/Neutron%20Factory%20Works.jpeg.webp?itok=FJTkVqsA)

Jun 14, 2021

#####  [Neutron Factory Works ](/neutron-factory-works)

Originally established in 1986 as Neutron Electric, today Neutron Factory Works (NFW) provides specialized industrial trades & technical services to factories throughout B.C. and Alberta.

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2022-11/Ela%20Alejandro%20image%2002.png.webp?itok=FKcOR97z)

May 17, 2021

#####  [Exploring a New Lane in Automotive Trades ](/Ela-Alejandro)

Ela Alejandrino moved to Canada over 10 years ago from the Philippines in search of a better future for her family. She recently took a trade sampler program to learn skills in the transportation trade industry.

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2022-11/Sam%20Tsai%20-%20Red%20Seal%20Plumber.png.webp?itok=4pOCvuz7)

Apr 26, 2021

#####  [Q+A with Red Seal Plumber Sam Tsai ](/sam-tsai)

I would love to run a successful company in the future and relay the morals and high-tier service that I was taught as a young apprentice. I want to be a role model that you don't have to scam and take advantage of others to do well in life. Treat others well and they will one day do likewise.

What's Next?
